scripts.build: ng build --prod --base-href=. && copyfiles package.json dist && cd electron && tsc
scripts.deploy: rimraf app && npm run build && electron-packager dist --all --electron-version=1.6.2 --overwrite --out=app && rimraf dist
scripts.deploy-mac: rimraf app/*mas* && npm run build && electron-packager dist --platform=mas --arch=all --electron-version=1.6.2 --overwrite --out=app --icon src/assets/icon.icns && rimraf dist
scripts.deploy-win: rimraf app/*windows* && npm run build && electron-packager dist --platform=win32 --arch=all --electron-version=1.6.2 --overwrite --out=app --icon src/assets/icon.ico && rimraf dist
scripts.deploy-lin: rimraf app/*linux* && npm run build && electron-packager dist --platform=linux --arch=all --electron-version=1.6.2 --overwrite --out=app --icon src/assets/icon.ico && rimraf dist
